title: Citizen Hub
contactTribunalMyCase: Contact the tribunal about my case
findLegalAdvice: Find legal advice (opens in new tab)
contactTribunal: Contact the tribunal about your case

appointLegalRepresentativeScreen.heading: Appoint a legal representative
appointLegalRepresentativeScreen.description: You can appoint a legal representative to act on your behalf in this employment tribunal claim.

submittedAlert: You have submitted your claim to the tribunal
processClaim: We aim to process your claim by
busyPeriod: . In busy periods it may take longer.

acknowledgement.header: The tribunal has acknowledged your claim
acknowledgement.p1: The tribunal has also served a Notice of Claim to the respondent and set a hearing date.
acknowledgement.p2:
What happens next
The tribunal has asked the respondent to respond to your claim by

rejection.header: The tribunal has rejected all or part of your claim
rejection.p1: The tribunal will close your claim.

respondentReceived.header: The tribunal has received a response from the respondent
respondentReceived.p1: We will process the response and contact you soon to tell you what will happen next.

respondentRejection.header: The tribunal has rejected the respondent's response.

respondentAcknowledgement.header: The tribunal has acknowledged the respondent's response.

respondentApplicationReceived.p1TypeB: You do not need to respond to this application.
respondentApplicationReceived.p1: If you have any objections or responses to their application you must send them to the tribunal as soon as possible and by

ecc.title: The tribunal has sent you a notification:

hearingBanner.hearing: The tribunal has sent you a notification about your hearing.

orderOrRequest.responseRequired: The tribunal requires some information from you.
orderOrRequest.noResponseRequired: The tribunal has sent you a notification

judgment.header: The tribunal has made a decision on your case.

decisionJudgment.headerClaimant: The tribunal has made a decision on your application to
decisionJudgment.headerRespondent: The tribunal has made a decision on the respondent's application to

storedPending.header: You have stored correspondence which you have not submitted to the tribunal
storedPending.line1: You must send a copy of this correspondence and all supporting documents to the other party before you submit it to the tribunal.
storedPending.line2: If the other party does respond to your application, they are expected to copy their response to you.

title.rule92Yes: You have sent a response to the tribunal and copied it to the respondent.

rule92No.p1: You have sent a response to the tribunal and given your reasons not to copy it to the respondent.
rule92No.p2: The tribunal will consider your reasons and let you know what happens next.

multiples.groupClaim: Your claim is part of a group claim
multiples.designated: Your individual case is designated the lead case in a group claim. You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
multiples.stayed: Your individual claim is stayed. The group claim will progress. You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
multiples.nonLead: You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.

Claimant not complied: tell the tribunal the claimant has not complied
Order a witness to attend to give eviden: order a witness to attend to give evidence
Strike out all or part of a claim: strike out all or part of a claim
